item.title: Restless Ghost [RuneSource] HELP ERROR
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Alright fixed Cooks assistant, now i added the restless ghost off of a tutorial but I am getting this error:

WalkToActionHandler.java:119: error: orphaned case
case 2640: // Altar for The Restless Ghost
^
1 error

and This is the code for the thing i put in:

case 2640: // Altar for The Restless Ghost if(player.getQuesting().getQuestStage(11) == 4) { if(!player.getInventory().checkForItem(new Item(553, 1))) { if(player.getInventory().getItemContainer().hasRoomFor(new Item(553, 1))) { player.getInventory().addItem(new Item(553, 1)); player.getQuesting().setQuestStage(11, 5); } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Not enough room in your inventory!"); } } else { player.getDialogue().sendStatement("I already have the Ghost's skull."); } } else { player.getActionSender().sendMessage("You find nothing."); } break;

Read full topic
